column4: hi guys, I'm having a little trouble setting up a Windows shared printer over SMB - i can connect to it, but it never prints anything..
I have a similar problem.  Haven't figured out how to get it to work yet.
what have you tried? maybe what doesn't work for you will for me :)
I've just tried setting it up using "new printer" and using the information for it that I know to be correct.
